lexUnit.name: roll.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: move a body part on an axis, rotate

sentence.text: Finally her eyes turned grey and rolled , and Odd-Knut thought she was dead .
Her iron-grey coat was black with sweat and dust , her thin sides heaving , her eyes rolling .
Their eyes rolled and their manes tossed , as , snorting and whinnying , they tried to bite each other .
The Marshal , his big eyes rolling round the depressing room lit by one dusty light-bulb because the small , barred window hardly let in any light , wondered if they ever managed it .
Joe 's eyes rolled around the room , noticing the expensive furniture I had bought recently .
Sandra stood there , her eyes rolling with fear , her complexion pasty under all that make-up .
She rolled her eyes and took another swig of gin .
Prentice rolled his eyes and puffed his cheeks out .
Louise rolled her eyes in exasperation .
He hesitated in confusion , while the priest rolled his eyes .
He rolled his eyes and blew her a kiss but unfortunately Maggie saw him do it .
Geoffrey rolled his eyes dramatically and headed for the door .
He shuddered and clapped a hand over his mouth , rolling his eyes theatrically .
` Ah -- hi , Mum , " Jack said , and rolled his eyes at Kath .
Roll the head three times to the left , then three times to the right , breathing easily all the time .
He grimaced , then rolled his head to look at me .
She rolled her head sideways on the pillow and murmured , ` I 'm so sorry . "
Lucien rolled his head from side to side upon the wooden bench .
He hit the floor hard , choked , then rolled over with his head cradled in his arms and his body curled up tightly .
Patrick stirred , rolled his head and spewed a few words out through his sliced lips and mangled mouth .
He rolled his head towards her .
` Hello in there , " she said to him , and he groaned and rolled his head towards her .
Many players automatically roll the wrists at the start of the backswing , with the club being laid at the top as a result .
At last Fernando moved , rolling himself slightly away from her to remove strands of her long hair from his jacket and smoothing them back where they belonged , down the side of her face .
Dawson rolled his left hand for a boogie-woogie riff and paddled an arpeggio with the right .
Now he could understand why the Finns came running out of their saunas and rolled themselves in the snow .
He rolled on to his side , facing her , and the movement woke her , as he had known it would .
Clare rolled over on her stomach .
Leith rolled over and buried her head in her pillow the moment the door had closed .
Do n't let your feet roll inwards and keep your knees over the toes !
Smirking slightly , Zephyr accepted half a dozen biscuits and a bowl of milky tea , then rolled on the carpet to remove the crumbs from her whiskers .
Margaret rolled her eyes at the ceiling .
She laughed and rolled her eyes .
She rolled her eyes heavenwards .
The pony was rolling its eyes but stood motionless because a young boy relentlessly twisted its ear .
Alice rolled her eyes upward rudely .
